description: Strengthening Partnerships under the AHDR Trust Fund -Toward the achievement of women participation in the Environment and Wildlife protection in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

subproject.corporate outcome: National capacities of women and youth developed to enable them to contribute to development strategies, policies and programmes targeting them.
subproject.description:
This project aims at supporting National Resources Conservation Training Center (NRCTC) at NCWCD in the development of national gender sensitive policies specifically related to Wildlife Conservation and biodiversity amongst other areas relating to the MDGs through;
1.	The creation of the nature based environmental educational facility for women
2.	The development of the nature based environmental educational curriculum.
3.	The development of the nature based environmental awareness materials.
4.	Capacity of NCWCD female staff built in nature based environmental concerns
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Strengthening Partnership to A

title: Strengthening Partnership to Address Gender Concerns
